actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Mica.
On agreeing to the Mica amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute consists of the original text of the bill, as reported, with section 201 (regarding enhanced performance management) deleted.
purpose: An amendment in the nature of a susbstitute consisting of the orginal text of the bill, as reported, with section 201 (regarding enhanced performance management) ommitted.
